thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Valley National Bancorp Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings $0.18/Shr

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Valley National Bancorp Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings $0.18/Shr
text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Valley National Bancorp:
* REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER NET INCOME AND SOLID NET INTEREST MARGIN
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.09 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.17 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.18 EXCLUDING ITEMS * QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME ON A TAX EQUIVALENT BASIS $173.9 MILLION INCREASED $7.1 MILLION AS COMPARED TO Q3 2017
* DURING Q4 2017, INCURRED $22.6 MILLION CHARGE DUE IMPACT OF TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
